info.name: username
info.description: The username/email used to log into Salesforce.

info.name: password
info.description: The password used to log into Salesforce.

info.name: security_token
info.description: A security token that is appended onto the end of the password. Can be obtained from Salesforce by going to 'Reset my Security Token' under personal settings.

info.name: client_id
info.description: The client id of the application. Found under Manage Apps in setup.

info.name: client_secret
info.description: The client secret of the application. Found under Manage Apps in setup.

info.name: salesforce_instance
info.description: The salesforce instance that the account is tied to. Can be found to the left of the salesforce url.

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enable debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
